org.openbel.framework.common.record
Class Record<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.common.record.Record<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The modeled item
Direct Known Subclasses:
NamespaceRecordFile.NamespaceRecord
public abstract class Record<T>
extends Object

Models a record for some <T> contained by a RecordFile.

Author:
Nick Bargnesi

Constructor Detail

Record

public Record(Column<?>... columns)
Creates a record associated with fixed-size columns.

Parameters:
columns - Columns composing each record; may not be null or have zero length
Throws:
InvalidArgument - Thrown if columns is null or invalid

Record

public Record(int recordSize,
              Column<?>... columns)
Creates a record associated with some number of columns with the last columns having an unknown size.

Parameters:
recordSize - The record size used to derive the size of the last column
columns - Columns composing each record; may not be zero or have zero length.
Throws:
InvalidArgument - Thrown if columns is null, zero-length, or invalid
Method Detail

readColumn

public final byte[] readColumn(byte[] buffer,
                               int column)
Returns the column's byte array data contained in buffer.

Parameters:
buffer - byte[]; must be non-null and of the same length as getRecordSize()
column - Column to read
Returns:
byte[]
Throws:
InvalidArgument - Thrown if buffer is null or invalid

readColumn

public final void readColumn(byte[] recBuffer,
                             byte[] colBuffer,
                             int column)
Copies the column's byte array data contained in recBuffer into the colBuffer.

Parameters:
recBuffer - byte[]; must be non-null and of the same length as getRecordSize()
colBuffer - byte[]; must be non-null and of the same length as the column size
column - Column to read
Throws:
InvalidArgument - Thrown either buffer or column is null or invalid

writeColumn

public final void writeColumn(byte[] colBuffer,
                              int column,
                              byte[] recBuffer)
Writes the column's buffer byte array data into the column contained by the record buffer.

Parameters:
colBuffer - Column buffer data
column - Column to write
recBuffer - Record buffer
Throws:
InvalidArgument - Thrown if either buffer or column is invalid, or either buffer is null

getRecordSize

public final int getRecordSize()
Returns the record size (the summation of all column sizes).

int

read

protected abstract T read(byte[] buffer)

Parameters:
